name: Luneville Hook
description: Fluid chain-work applied from the reverse using a tambour hook, enabling high-density couture finishes with beads, sequins, and threads in a single continuous motion.

name: Goldwork Relief
description: Raised metallic detailing for sculptural motifs and directional highlight effects. Combines padding, couching, and metal thread layering for three-dimensional surface richness.

name: Micro Sequin Degrade
description: Controlled tonal gradients that read as liquid light under runway lighting. Uses graduated sequin sizes and density mapping to create painterly colour transitions.

name: Corded Couching
description: Architectural cord mapping to define silhouette seams and movement lines. Creates invisible structural reinforcement while adding surface texture and directional flow.

name: Pearl Placement
description: Precision hand-setting of natural and cultured pearls in graduated density patterns. Requires individual tension calibration to maintain fabric softness beneath heavy surface coverage.

name: Cutwork Engineering
description: Controlled fabric removal combined with reinforcement stitching to create transparency patterns that maintain garment integrity under movement and stress.
